other_tests.findings: S. haematobium eggs were found in semen specimens from patients 1, 3, and 4.
other_tests.changes_over_time: A second examination of semen specimens revealed the presence of schistosomal eggs.

other_tests.findings: S. haematobium eggs were found in a prostate biopsy specimen from patient 2.
Normal for all but 1 patient who had an enlarged prostate.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At follow-up, the size of the prostate had returned to normal for patient 2.
